wikipedia_page.main: Harold Atkinson (28 July 1925 – 4 September 2003) was an English footballer who played as a centre forward for Carlton, Tranmere Rovers and Chesterfield. He made 197 appearances for Tranmere, scoring 104 goals.

response: *4 September 2003: Harold Atkinson, 78, scored 91 league goals as a centre-forward for Tranmere Rovers in the nine seasons following the end of World War II before finishing his senior career with a spell at Chesterfield.
